name: Login Flow Test
description: Test the login functionality of the HAINDY demo application
requirements:
Test the login flow:
1. Navigate to the login page
2. Enter username 'testuser' in the username field
3. Enter password 'password123' in the password field
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that we see a success message or are redirected to the dashboard
expected_outcomes: Login form is visible and accessible
Username and password can be entered
